Function reference

All functions

age_height
Age vs. height for private and rural school children
eda_3pt()
3-point summary plot
eda_add()
Add graphical EDA elements to exsiting plot
eda_bipow()
Ladder of powers transformation on bivariate data with three-point summary plot
eda_boxls()
Create boxplots equalized by level and spread
eda_dens()
Overlapping density distributions for two variables
eda_lm()
Least Squares regression plot (with optional LOESS fit)
eda_lsum()
Tukey's letter value summaries
eda_pol()
Polish two-way tables
eda_qq()
QQ and MD plots
eda_re()
Re-expression function
eda_rline()
Tukey's resistant line
eda_sl()
Tukey's spread-level function
eda_trim() eda_trim_df() eda_ltrim() eda_ltrim_df() eda_rtrim() eda_rtrim_df()
Trims vector and dataframe objects
eda_unipow()
Ladder of powers transformation on a single vector
neoplasms
Breast cancer mortality vs. temperature
nine_point
Andrew Siegel's pathological 9-point dataset
plot(<eda_polish>)
Plot eda_polish tables or diagnostic plots
plot(<eda_rline>)
Plot eda_rline model
tukeyedar
Tukey inspired exploratory data analysis functions
wat05
Temperature normals for Waterville Maine (1991-2020)
wat95
Legacy temperature normals for Waterville Maine (1981-2010)

Developed by Manuel Gimond.
